sentences.en: Cook the sauce over a medium heat until it thickens. Meanwhile start boiling the water for the pasta.
sentences.cn: 用中火把调味汁煮到变稠，同时烧水准备煮意大利面。

sentences.en: I continued working, meanwhile, he went out shopping.
sentences.cn: 我继续工作, 这期间他出去买东西.

sentences.en: I knew I wouldn’t get my exam results for several weeks, and I wasn’t sure what to do in the meanwhile.
sentences.cn: 我知道我要几星期后才能拿到考试成绩，我不知道这期间该做什么。

sentences.en: I'll be back soon. Meanwhile follow on.
sentences.cn: 我马上就回来, 你继续干下去好了.

sentences.en: Meanwhile the personality cult around this campaigner grew.
sentences.cn: 同时，对这位竞选者的个人崇拜正在逐渐升温。

sentences.en: Meanwhile the race is on to resurface the road before next Wednesday.
sentences.cn: 与此同时正赶着在下周三之前把路面重新铺好。

sentences.en: Meanwhile we must do a good job in transport and communications.
sentences.cn: 同时我们要搞好交通运输工作.

sentences.en: Meanwhile, as the politicians haggle, the violence worsens.
sentences.cn: 在政客们大打嘴仗的同时，暴力事件愈演愈烈。

sentences.en: Meanwhile, back in London, Palace Pictures was collapsing.
sentences.cn: 与此同时，伦敦的皇宫影业公司也正在分崩离析。

sentences.en: Meanwhile, Dusty Springfield's new TV series began a run on BBC 1.
sentences.cn: 同时，达斯蒂·斯普林菲尔德的电视剧新作开始在BBC1台播放。

sentences.en: Meanwhile, melt the white chocolate in a bowl suspended over simmering water.
sentences.cn: 同时，把碗置于微沸的水上，将白巧克力放入碗中使其熔化。

sentences.en: Meanwhile, sales of vinyl records halved in 1992 to just 6.7m.
sentences.cn: 与此同时，黑胶唱片的销售量在1992年下降了一半，只有670万张。
同时，又无聊得让人苦恼不已。

sentences.en: The doctor will see you again next week. Meanwhile, you must rest as much as possible.
sentences.cn: 医生下周还会给你看病。在此期间，你一定要尽可能多休息。

sentences.en: The flight will be announced soon. Meanwhile, please remain seated.
sentences.cn: 很快就要广播通知登机，在此期间请继续留在座位上。

sentences.en: The media, meanwhile, has blown hot and cold on the affair.
sentences.cn: 同时，媒体对这件事的态度表现得忽冷忽热。

sentences.en: The public, meanwhile, hold architects in low esteem.
sentences.cn: 与此同时，公众对建筑师并不看重。

sentences.en: You, meanwhile, will be skulking in the safety of the car.
sentences.cn: 与此同时，你会安全地藏在汽车里。

trans.tran_cn: 同时，在此期间，与之相比
trans.tran_en: in the period of time between two events
